name: Rock Paper Clicker
description:
"Rock Paper Clicker" or RPC is my first game that I have been working on it for the past few months. Not the longest game, but give it a try, it may surprise you...

The game's logic admittedly doesn't make a lot of sense at times, but try accepting this and follow along for a more enjoyable experience.

This game is best as a download on Windows. Unfortunately, Mac and Linux has yet to be supported, however that may come soon after some further testing. In the meantime, game is also supported in WebGL, so you can play on a web browsers.

Please share your thoughts, no matter how brutally honest (Try to keep it civil however).
